name: Uncontrolled Pedestrian Crossing Evaluation Incorporating Highway Capacity Manual Unsignalized Pedestrian Crossing Analysis Methodology
purpose: Manual and methodology to count and analyze nonmotorized traffic. Intended to make future studies regarding nonmotorized traffic monitoring more accurate
author: Bryan Nemeth, Ross Tillman, Jeremy Melquist, Ashley Hudson
image_description: Image of the A Line bus overlayed over a Blue line Train Station
